message: I'm feeling generous, but I'll need the lion's share to get started. What do you say?
I'll give you a fair share, but I'm not being too generous
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile.  Let's split it fairly, but I need to at least recoup some of what I lost last round.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still not being too generous

This is my final offer. I'm willing to accept a slightly smaller share to end this negotiation.  If we keep going, the value of the money will continue to decrease, and neither of us will be happy in the end.
